channel.title: Actions on Kamil Pro
channel.description: Recent content in Actions on Kamil Pro

item.title: Powershell And GitHub Actions
item.description: I am happy to announce my latest product - PowerShell and GitHub Actions - in which you will learn how to develop, build, test and release a PowerShell module using GitHub Actions. The series is divided into three projects, which build upon each other to create the module. In the first project - Build a Module - you will start by developing a module locally. The module will implement GitHub’s API so that it will be able to manage GitHub’s repository lifecycle - creation, removal, updating and retrieving the repository.
